species.name: simipour
descriptions: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: torrent
abilities.effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
